subject: Football
Super Bowl
lead_paragraph: The contrasts of quarterbacks Peyton Manning, the Broncos’ old-school pocket passer, and Cam Newton, the Panthers’ young, scrambling improviser, will be the game’s main story line.
snippet: The contrasts of quarterbacks Peyton Manning, the Broncos’ old-school pocket passer, and Cam Newton, the Panthers’ young, scrambling improviser, will be the game’s main story line.
